update.description:
This pull request contains all the changes needed to release Task 2. This includes changes from other open pull requests plus some changes on top.

I decided to make this pull request so others have a chance to try everything together while reviewing the other pull requests, if they want to.

As other pull requests are merged, this one will get smaller. Feel free to review this pull request directly if you're more comfortable with that.

Pull requests contained in this one:

* ~~pull request #38~~
* ~~pull request #44~~
* ~~pull request #45~~
* ~~pull request #46~~
* ~~pull request #47~~
* ~~pull request #48~~

I've added instructions to the [wiki](#!/osrf/srcsim/wiki/finals_task2).

### Summary

* Added start boxes (see tutorial)
* Passing SDF pointers directly to tasks and checkpoints
* Changed the skip pose logic:
    * Before (`<task_N_checkpoint_M_pose>`): Pose before the checkpoint
    * After (`<taskN><checkpointM><robot_skip_pose>`): Pose after the checkpoint
* Added `unique_task2.world` and `unique_task2.launch`
* Panel is also teleported when skipping T2CP2
update.title: Task 2: integration

content.raw: Thanks for the review, @dirk-thomas ! I found an error on the checkpoints which couldn't be skipped and fixed that on fa75d89. That's to comply with [this table](#!/osrf/srcsim/wiki/skip_summary). Now you can skip to `2 4` and the solar panel is open.
content.html: Thanks for the review, @dirk-thomas ! I found an error on the checkpoints which couldn't be skipped and fixed that on fa75d89. That's to comply with this table. Now you can skip to 2 4 and the solar panel is open.
